title: New: Oldermost – Honey With Tea
content:
Getting some laidback War On Drugs vibes from this new track from Philadelphia’s Oldermost – not too much of a surprise in truth when you find out that guitarist Mike Sobel contributed to Eyes to the Wind, a cut lifted from Granduciel’s 2014 breakthrough release Lost in the Dream.

It has that life affirming vibe to it that helped LitD become an instant classic. Stick it on, drift away; everything isn’t as complicated as it seems. Check out Honey With Tea below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
